verses.verse: Therefore <S%G3767><s%> being justified <S%G1344><s%> by faith, <S%G4102><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> with God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

By whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> access <S%G4318><s%> by faith <S%G4102><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> we stand, <S%G2476><s%> and rejoice <S%G2744><s%> in hope <S%G1680><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And not only <S%G3440><s%> so, but we glory <S%G2744><s%> in tribulations <S%G2347><s%> also: <S%G2532><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that tribulation <S%G2347><s%> works <S%G2716><s%> patience; <S%G5281><s%>
And patience, <S%G5281><s%> experience; <S%G1382><s%> and experience, <S%G1382><s%> hope: <S%G1680><s%>

And hope <S%G1680><s%> makes <S%G2617><s%> not ashamed; <S%G2617><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is shed <S%G1632><s%> abroad <S%G1632><s%> in our hearts <S%G2588><s%> by the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> to us.
For when we were yet <S%G2089><s%> without <S%G772><s%> strength, <S%G772><s%> in due <S%G514><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died <S%G599><s%> for the ungodly. <S%G765><s%>

For scarcely <S%G3433><s%> for a righteous <S%G1342><s%> man will one <S%G5100><s%> die: <S%G599><s%> yet <S%G1063><s%> peradventure <S%G5029><s%> for a good <S%G18><s%> man some <S%G5100><s%> would even dare <S%G5111><s%> to die. <S%G599><s%>

But God <S%G2316><s%> commends <S%G4921><s%> his love <S%G26><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> us, in that, while we were yet <S%G2089><s%> sinners, <S%G268><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died <S%G599><s%> for us.

Much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> being now <S%G3568><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> by his blood, <S%G129><s%> we shall be saved <S%G4982><s%> from wrath <S%G3709><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him.

For if, <S%G1487><s%> when we were enemies, <S%G2190><s%> we were reconciled <S%G2644><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> by the death <S%G2288><s%> of his Son, <S%G5207><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> more, <S%G3123><s%> being reconciled, <S%G2644><s%> we shall be saved <S%G4982><s%> by his life. <S%G2222><s%>

And not only <S%G3440><s%> so, but we also <S%G2532><s%> joy <S%G2744><s%> in God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> by whom <S%G3739><s%> we have now <S%G3568><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> the atonement. <S%G2643><s%>

Why, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> as by one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G444><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> and death <S%G2288><s%> by sin; <S%G266><s%> and so <S%G3779><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> passed <S%G1330><s%> on all <S%G3956><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> for that all <S%G3956><s%> have sinned: <S%G264><s%>
(For until <S%G891><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> was in the world: <S%G2889><s%> but sin <S%G266><s%> is not imputed <S%G1677><s%> when there is no <S%G3361><s%> law. <S%G3551><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> reigned <S%G936><s%> from Adam <S%G76><s%> to Moses, <S%G3475><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them that had not sinned <S%G264><s%> after <S%G1909><s%> the similitude <S%G3667><s%> of Adam's <S%G76><s%> transgression, <S%G3847><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is the figure <S%G5179><s%> of him that was to come. <S%G3195><s%>

But not as the offense, <S%G3900><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is the free <S%G5486><s%> gift. <S%G5486><s%> For if <S%G1487><s%> through the offense <S%G3900><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> be dead, <S%G599><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and the gift <S%G1431><s%> by grace, <S%G5485><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is by one <S%G1520><s%> man, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> has abounded <S%G4052><s%> to many. <S%G4183><s%>

And not as it was by one <S%G1520><s%> that sinned, <S%G264><s%> so is the gift: <S%G1434><s%> for the judgment <S%G2917><s%> was by one <S%G1520><s%> to condemnation, <S%G2631><s%> but the free <S%G5486><s%> gift <S%G5486><s%> is of many <S%G4183><s%> offenses <S%G3900><s%> to justification. <S%G1345><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> by one <S%G1520><s%> man's offense <S%G3900><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> reigned <S%G936><s%> by one; <S%G1520><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> they which receive <S%G2983><s%> abundance <S%G4050><s%> of grace <S%G5485><s%> and of the gift <S%G1431><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> shall reign <S%G936><s%> in life <S%G2222><s%> by one, <S%G1520><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>)

Therefore <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%> as by the offense <S%G3900><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> judgment came on all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%> to condemnation; <S%G2631><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> by the righteousness <S%G1345><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> the free gift came on all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%> to justification <S%G1347><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>

For as by one <S%G1520><s%> man's <S%G444><s%> disobedience <S%G3876><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> were made <S%G2525><s%> sinners, <S%G268><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> by the obedience <S%G5218><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> shall many <S%G4183><s%> be made <S%G2525><s%> righteous. <S%G1342><s%>

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> entered, <S%G3922><s%> that the offense <S%G3900><s%> might abound. <S%G4121><s%> But where <S%G3757><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> abounded, <S%G4121><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> did much <S%G5248><s%> more abound: <S%G5248><s%>

That as sin <S%G266><s%> has reigned <S%G936><s%> to death, <S%G2288><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> might grace <S%G5485><s%> reign <S%G936><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> to eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> by Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
